job_description:
I‚Äôm Hiring ‚Äì Senior Java Backend Developer üö®
I‚Äôm currently hiring a Senior Java Backend Developer for a 100% onsite role in Alpharetta, GA (from Day 1).
‚úî Experience: 6+ years
 ‚úî Interview: Face-to-Face (L1 & Client)
 ‚úî Availability: Monday & Tuesday required
 ‚úî Environment: SAFe Agile
Tech Stack: Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, Microservices, Kafka, REST/SOAP APIs, JUnit, Mockito, Docker, Kubernetes, Cassandra.
If you have strong backend experience and enjoy working on scalable, high-performance systems, I‚Äôd love to connect.
üì© Interested candidates can message me on LinkedIn or email: vinesh@quantumworldit.com
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks
- Make sure to format the body same like below example response but alter according to jd

Example format:
Hello ,\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:

Hello,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Senior Java Backend Developer (Alpharetta, GA)
email_body:
Hello,

I am excited to express my interest in the Senior Java Backend Developer position in Alpharetta, GA as mentioned in your job listing. With over 6 years of experience in Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, Microservices, Kafka, and other technologies listed in the job description, I believe my skills align well with the requirements of the role.

I have a proven track record of designing and developing scalable systems, working with REST/SOAP APIs, and deploying applications on Docker and Kubernetes. My experience in SAFe Agile environments and familiarity with Cassandra make me a strong candidate for this position.

I have attached my resume for your review. I am eager to discuss how my background, skills, and enthusiasm for high-performance systems could contribute to your team. Please let me know if there is any further information I can provide or if we can schedule a meeting to discuss this opportunity in more detail.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
Position:

Sr. Java Backend Developer

Location:

Plano, TX
/ Atlanta, GA
(F2F Required & Onsite from Day 1)

Type of Employment: Contract

Rate: $50/hr on C2C

Job Description:

Mode of interview: F2F (Both L1 & Client interview)

Monday & Tuesday Between 10:00 AM to 04:00 PM EST

Job Description:

Safe Agile trained with 6+ years of experience.

Experience Java, J2EE, Spring boot with Microservice & Kafka.

Experience with API testing, load and performance test tools like JMeter, Postman.

Knowing Splunk, ELK for searching, analyzing and visualizing data generated by application.

Knowing the functioning of containerization tools like Kubernetes, Docker.

Knowing tools like Quantum Metrics and IBM Tealeaf to capture user experience on websites.

Knowledge JUNIT Mockito.

Migration experience from Monolithic Architecture to Microservice Architect.

Extensive software development experience using Java.

Experience using Java JSON to create microservices RESTful services.

Experience with version control tools such as Git.

Experience with XP Principles, including TDD and continuous deployment.

Experience with Agile development methodologies.

Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem solving skills on highly complex problems; technical agility.

Experience with Microservices /Rest services / Soap).
Share profiles with work authorisation and current location to kumar@placifylr.com

job_description:
Greetings!
 We are currently looking for a Java Developer 
 If you are looking for new opportunities and would like to discuss this opportunity further, please contact me at your earliest convenience. I can be reached by email at bertena@systemian.com
 Please Note: We are a direct vendor to our client. The client has an urgent requirement and this opportunity has a very high chance of an immediate interview.

Title: Java Developer
Location: Columbus, OH

*****Local only preferred. Requires In person interview
*****Fake DL‚Äôs not allowed
*****This position is ONSITE
*****Requires ONSITE interviews

Mandatory Skills:
¬∑       Experience in software development using web technologies with expertise in Angular
¬∑       Experience with Java Persistence API (JPA)
¬∑       Expert proficiency in Angular (including TypeScript, components, services, routing, and state management like RxJS or similar
¬∑       Experience designing, developing, and consuming RESTful APIs for seamless integration between the Angular frontend and Java backend
¬∑       Familiarity with database technologies (SQL) and ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) tools like Hibernate/JPA.
¬∑       Experience in Java solution development in the Windows environment.
¬∑       Excellent written and oral communication skills with technical and business teams.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

job_description:
üö® We‚Äôre Hiring | Sr. Java Backend Developer üö®
üìç Location: Alpharetta, GA (Onsite from Day 1 ‚Äì Local Candidates)
 üñ• Interview Mode: Face-to-Face (Both Vendor & Client Interviews)
 üõÇ Visa: H4-EAD, L2S, E3, TN, USC
 üì© Send resumes to: shruthi.v@staffbees.com
üîπ Role Overview
We are looking for a Senior Java Backend Developer with strong microservices and Kafka experience. The candidate must be SAFe Agile trained, hands-on, and comfortable working in a fast-paced onsite environment from day one.
üîπ Required Skills & Experience
6+ years of experience with Java, J2EE, Spring Boot
Strong experience with Microservices architecture & Kafka
Migration experience from Monolithic to Microservices
RESTful services using Java & JSON
Experience with API testing & performance testing tools
 (Postman, JMeter)
Strong knowledge of Splunk & ELK for log analysis
Hands-on experience with Docker & Kubernetes
Experience with JUnit & Mockito
Familiarity with Cassandra
Experience with Git and version control
Knowledge of XP practices (TDD, Continuous Deployment)
Strong experience in Agile / SAFe Agile methodologies
Exposure to Quantum Metrics & IBM Tealeaf for user experience tracking
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
üì© Interested or have a strong referral in GA?
 Send resumes to shruthi.v@staffbees.com
